Lotus Sutra Study Class:

Todays Class:  Introduction to the Lotus Sutra and Chapter 5

Once a month we study one chapter of the Lotus Sutra deeply. Each class will be self contained so you do not have to start at class one, but can join in at anytime. Please read the chapter that will be studied in advance, if you can. A list of Lotus Sutra translations used in the class is provided for your convenience.  If you have any questions please call or email Ryuoh Shonin at the Temple.

www.newenglandbuddhist.org

 

“The Lotus Sutra” translation by Senchu Murano - Nichiren Shu Shimbun - isbn 4-89045-107-2 The official Nichiren Shu translation. Unfortunately is currently out of print. We will let you know as soon as it becomes available. Sometimes appears in used book stores or Amazon,

 

“The Threefold Lotus Sutra” Kosei Publishing Co. - isbn 4-333-00208-7 A good translation that is used by Rissho Kosei Kei. Available at  Kosei press, Amazon and other book dealers.

 

“The Lotus Sutra” translation by Gene Reeves - Wisdom publications - isbn 0-861719571-3 available at Wisdom publications, Amazon and other book dealers.
